data: Chris Littler, Ph.D Chris Littler, Ph.D Professor (940) 565-4561 clittler@unt.edu Physics 306 Ph.D (University of North Texas, 1984) Research interest: Solid State Physics. Solid state physics; semiconductor materials growth; scattering mechanisms and influence of impurities; transport coefficients; laser spectroscopy. Dr. Chris Littler's research interests lie in the areas of electrical and optical characterization of novel semiconductor materials.
